items.description:
A curated list of awesome Game Boy (Color) Development resources, tools, docs, related projects and open-source ROMs. Inspired by the awesome list thing.
You can find a (way cooler) web version of this list here.
items.title: Join us on Discord

items.description: The single, most comprehensive technical reference to Game Boy available to the public. Corrected, updated and maintained by the community.
items.title: Pan Docs

items.description: A precise documentation by AntonioND to make a cycle-accurate Game Boy emulator.
items.title: The Cycle-Accurate Game Boy Docs

items.description: by Gekkio.
items.title: Complete Technical Reference

items.description: by Rodrigo Copetti.
items.title: Game Boy Architecture: A Practical Analysis

items.description: Report of an hardware  (on a Terasic DE1-SoC Board) developed as final project for the CSEE4840 Embedded Systems Design course at Columbia University.

items.description: Hardware schematics.

items.description: Provides a study on the hardware and detailed constructional information for the implementation of three 8-bit bidirectional parallel ports.

items.title: Related custom hardware
